settings.name: Reference time
settings.description: Select a reference time towards which your data are evaluated. Default is NOW.

settings.name: Voltage variable name
settings.description: Provide the exact name of the variable in your data describing tag voltage. If unsure, run the first App of your Workflow and see the Cargo Agent results (green button on the right) for the correct voltage attribute name spelling.

settings.name: Migration distance (7 days)
settings.description: Define radius (in m) of which the animal must move out to define as migration behaviour.

settings.name: Dead indication distance (7 days)
settings.description: Define radius (in m) in which the animal must remain to be defined as dead.
